text: shared bottle, poured hazy deep dark red to purple in colour with a dark pink head. Nose explodes with an intense deep dark jammy raspberry flavour, Some cherries, light vanilla oak, light acid tannis notes, earth fruits, light grains, light sherry spirit, light spice yeast, tart fruits. Amazing thick raspberry mouthfeel. Delicious. Lives up the hype

Bottle shared with the DB guys. Light hazy dark reddish pour with a small light pink head. Tons of juicy berries, loads of raspberries, subtle tartness, some vanilla, notes of port and sherry, light oxidation and some oily oaky notes.

Bottle thanks to bursprak. Pours hazy dark red with a small light pink head. Aromas of huge raspberry jam, lactic, vanilla, port, lactic, tannic. Taste is tannic, jammy, dry cherries, light funk, lactic, light vinegary.

Bottle Thanks to a guy who likes to live his life with a nice glass. Gesundheit! Pours hazy deep red with a bright purple head. Aroma of pithy raspberries, frozen raspberries, red sweet berries, sherry, sweet vinous notes, slight cherry, vanilla and marzipan. The taste is sweet and tart with lots of raspberries, cherries, vanilla, marzipan, sweet cherry, slight tannins. oak. This is really really good and I probably prefer it over the original.

Dark purplish red color, typical atrial deep raspberry nose. This beer drinks with a richer profile with the sherry barrel not necessarily adding a huge flavor to this like with gin nocturn but a really complex profile where this beer falls flatter on the pallet and feels much more substantial in the mouth than normal atrial the additional barrel aging imparts a bigger oak profile where normal atrial you get an almost one note raspberry flavor. Medium-thick mouthfeel that gives it a perception of being lower carb.

Bottle at amazing tasting 30th birthday of Alexander. Many thanks again!
APPEARANCE: clear deep dark red beer, small unstable white head.
NOSE: sourness, fruity, oak, sherry, some alcohol.
TASTE: very tart, lots of oak, very fruity, nice balance of red fruits and sourness.

Bottle shared by Dj at the fart lobby share in the hyatt at rbwg 2016. Big thanks DJ for sharing this tiny tiny bottle (which Im sure was not easy to get) with like 10 different ratebeerians and making sure everyone got a couple nice Danish sips. This is what ratebeer is all about and DJ embodies it. The beer was pretty awesome--DJ also poured a regular Atrial so we could have them side by side. The sherry barrel def adds a little more character with sherry noted on the nose and flavor, but I cant get enough of the regular atrial and its almost perfect tart raspberry flavor. This was top notch though. My second favorite JK beer after the regular Atrial.

500 ml bottle shared by djd07 - thanks again, DJ! Pours a hazy ruby color, darker and murkier than the regular one, with less of a head, too. Sweet and oaky Sherry barrel atop gorgeous waves of raspberries. Black cherries, lemon, funk, florals, wood. Medium-bodied, with a tart mouthfeel and low to moderate carbonation. But more sweetness than the base beer, too. While I still prefer the base beer, this is absolutely awesome stuff. Itd be hard to mess up a barrel treatment of this - and yet, they do it really well.

UPDATED: FEB 13, 2016 Bottle at RBWG 2016. Lightly funky and musty nose, moderately woody nose. Red color with off white pink head. Really fucken tart lemon flavor followed by a gravely fruit presence in the throat. Good but I thought their other fruited sours were more well balanced.

Post lobby bootle share - massive thanks to Daniel, 02/02/16.
Lightly hazed reddish maroon with a decent crimson covering.
Nose is big funky red berry, cherry, raspberry tarte, light balsa, acidic drizzle, subtle barrel.
Taste comprises tangy red berry must, sharp pink berry, wood must, acidic rise, citric piss, lemon drizzle, mellow sherry barrel, tangy fruit, cherry stones.
Medium bodied, fine carbonation, mellow acidic rise.
Xolid BA sour - great balance and drinkbility.
user_location: Hazlemere, the lower Xhitlerns, Buckinghamshire, ENGLAND

text: 375 ml bottle to taster (thanks djd07). Looks good; a cloudy, juicy raspberry with bubbly eggshell lacing. Smells awesome! Tart, funky, and oaky with a great raspberry nose alongside a nice vinous presence from the barrel. Tastes like it smells, but not quite as fruity, with a touch of pleasant red wine vinegar. Mouthfeel is medium-bodied with well-balanced acidity. Outstanding.

Bottle. Pours a cloudy dark ruby with small off beige head that diminishes to nothing. The aroma is strong sherry, oak, raspeberry, funk. Thick mouth, strong barrel character, jammy raspberry, lingering sweetness from the sherry, nice sour, light acidity, really impressive version of the original.

Bottle - Much softer than the original. Mulled fruit, nice Berry and sherry peeks through. Ruby red with a pinkish white head. Blended nice berries and sweetness with a great balance of sweetness and tartness.

Bottle shared during RBWG 2016 - big thanks to Daniel! Pours deep blood red with a slight foamy topping head. Great aroma, lots of rich berries, cherry, grape, vinous, oak. Light sweet flavor with sharp acidity, musty berries, more woody notes, light earth, iodine, grape, raspberry. Light bodied with fine, spritzy carbonation. Cleansing finish, dry, with stern acidity, very slight vinegar aspect, more tart berries, drying oaky notes. Great stuff overall.

Bottle at the hotel lobby fart share @RBWG 2016. Thanks DJ! Almost clear deep ruby liquid with small to medium light pink head. Aroma of raspberries, light wood, sherry, red berries, lemon, wood and light red apple. Taste is dry and medium sour with notes of raspberries, lemon, light wood and red apples. Medium bodied with medium carbonation. Awesome.

Awesome 375ml bottle thanks to rich. Pours out cloudy ruby maroon topped with a pink head. nose is crazy raspberry jam a epic sharp kick sweetness and a amazing barrel touch. Taste is as amazing as the nose this is nuts prickly raspberry jam a great tartness wow this is amazing.
Bottle from trade. I thought I loved atrial but then I tried this. Sherry adds a little more complexity and you can still taste the base beer. So glad I got this
Reddish/purple pour, pink tinged head. Really a good beer. Lots of berry flavors, sherry, nice sharp sourness. The beer is soft on the tongue. Great expression of AR.

Deep vinous purple in color... Aroma of dark ripe juicy raspberries, sherry, red wine grapes... Flavor is raspberry jam, oak, rich and full red wine, light tartness, sherry on palate... Amazingly good, don't want to finish 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottle - pours bright red white head - nose and taste of raspberry, sherry, oak, funky berry acid - medium body
Bottle. Pours bright red with white head. Aroma is raspberry, strong red wine, cherry. Taste is yogurty, tangy, very windy, juicy. Overall, very unique but quite good.

(330ml bottle) clear deep red, no real head. Nose of heavy wood char, raspberries, touch alcohol, sherry, seeds and fruit. Taste of sherry, tamarind, fairly sour, medium char, the fruit comes in on the back end, medium amount of alcohol on the finish. medium carbonation.
bottle, tons of sherry and wine flavors, the raspberries are much more muted than the base beer is by itself. Very complex with tons of berry flavors.

Bottle at home, purchased from the brewery at the release. Pours a dark reddish purple, little head. Looks like pomegranate juice. Aroma is fruity, raspberry jam, oak, red wine, faint sherry and a bit of booze. Taste is fruity raspberry, a bit of raspberry jam, faint oak. This is nicely tart, a bit puckering at times but not overpowering. Notes of red wine and sherry are present. Deep fruitiness present. Really nice. Medium body, medium carbonation. Finishes a bit dry. Flavors linger on the palate for quite a while. This is a great beer. Wish it was in 500 ml format!! One of the best Ive had from JK.
Baby bottle, over at Mikeys.. . Pours a deep raspberry.. Light foam really .. . Dry .. Woody, maple, raspberry, and cellar raspberry jam .. Really intricate .. . I got so much glass in my foot
Bottle..Pour is redish pink with a pink head..Nose is raspberry, berries, honey, spice, cinnamon, jammy..Taste is raspberry seed, mashed berries, spice, yogurt, toast, nice musty, jam.
